statements.chinese: 当我（过去）见到你的时候
当我第一次（过去）见到你的时候
当我第一次（过去）见到你的时候你（过去）是非常年轻的
statements.english: you were very young when I first saw you
I want to eat an apple

statements.chinese: 我想要每天吃一个苹果
statements.english: I want to eat an apple every day
I eat an apple every day

statements.chinese: 她在一小时之前吃了一个苹果
statements.english: she ate an apple an hour ago

statements.chinese: 她在一小时之前没吃一个苹果
statements.english: she didn't eat an apple an hour ago
I want to drink some water

statements.chinese: 我想要每天早上喝一些水
statements.english: I want to drink some water every morning
I drink some water every morning

statements.chinese: 我今天早上喝了一些水
statements.english: I drank some water this morning

statements.chinese: 我今天早上没喝任何水
statements.english: I didn't drink any water this morning

statements.chinese: 他（过去）知道问题的答案
statements.english: he knew the answer to the question

statements.chinese: 他已经知道问题的答案
statements.english: he already knew the answer to the question

statements.chinese: 他（过去）不知道问题的答案
statements.english: he didn't know the answer to the question

statements.chinese: 他已经知道问题的答案
statements.english: he already knew the answer to the question

statements.chinese: 我（过去）忘记告诉你他已经知道问题的答案
statements.english: I forgot to tell you he already knew the answer to the question

statements.chinese: 我在两年前失去了我的工作
statements.english: I lost my job two years ago

statements.chinese: 我在两年前没有失去我的工作
statements.english: I didn't lose my job two years ago

statements.chinese: 我在一小时之前离开了她的办公室
statements.english: I left her office an hour ago

statements.chinese: 我在一小时之前没有离开她的办公室
statements.english: I didn't leave her office an hour ago
she slept in my room last night

statements.chinese: 她昨晚没有睡在我的房间
statements.english: she didn't sleep in my room last night

statements.chinese: 她昨晚没有睡在我的房间
statements.english: she didn't sleep in my room last night

statements.chinese: 我告诉过你她昨晚没有睡在我的房间
statements.english: I told you she didn't sleep in my room last night

statements.chinese: 我告诉过你她昨晚没有睡在我的房间但是你（过去）不明白
statements.english: I told you she didn't sleep in my room last night but you didn't understand
I want to buy a house

statements.chinese: 我在两年之前买了一个房子
statements.english: I bought a house two years ago

statements.chinese: 我在两年之前没有买一个房子
statements.english: I didn't buy a house two years ago

statements.chinese: 他在两年之前买了一个房子
statements.english: he bought a house two years ago

statements.chinese: 他在两年之前没有买一个房子
statements.english: he didn't buy a house two years ago

statements.chinese: 你必须明白我在两年之前买了一个房子
statements.english: you have to understand I bought a house two years ago
I need to wash my face
I need to wash my face every day
I wash my face every day

statements.chinese: 我今天早上洗了我的脸
statements.english: I washed my face this morning

statements.chinese: 我告诉过你我今天早上洗了我的脸
statements.english: I told you I washed my face this morning

statements.chinese: 他两年前买了一个房子
statements.english: he bought a house two years ago

statements.chinese: 他告诉我他两年前买了一个房子
statements.english: he told me he bought a house two years ago

statements.chinese: 我昨晚打了电话给他而且他告诉我他在两年之前买了一个房子
statements.english: I called him last night and he told me he bought a house two years ago
